verses.arabic: حمٓ
verses.english: Ha, Meem.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.english: By the clear Book,
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da Littãfi Mabayyani.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mũ, Muka saukar da shi a cikin wani dare mai albarka. Lalle Mũ' Mun kasance Mãsu yin gargaɗi.

verses.arabic: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
verses.english: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -
verses.hausa: A cikinsa (shi daren) ake rarrabe kõwane umurui bayyananne.

verses.arabic: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.english: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]
verses.hausa: Umurni na daga wurinMu. Lalle Mũ ne Muka kasanceMãsu aikãwã.

verses.arabic: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
verses.hausa: Sabõda rahama daga Ubangijinka. Lalle Shĩ, Shi ne Mai ji, Mãsani.

verses.arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.english: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.
verses.hausa: (Shĩ ne) Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa da abin da ke a tsakãninsu, idan kun kasance mãsu yaƙĩni (za ku gãne haka).

verses.arabic: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.
verses.hausa: Babu abin bautãwa fãce Shi. Yana rãyarwa Kuma Yana kashẽwa. (Shi ne) Ubangijinku, kuma Ubangijin ubanninku na farko.

verses.arabic: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.english: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.
verses.hausa: A'a sũ, sunã wãsã a cikin shakka.

verses.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka dakata rãnar da sama zã tã zo da hayãƙi bayyananne.

verses.arabic: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: Covering the people; this is a painful torment.
verses.hausa: Yanã rufe mutãne. Wannan wata azãba ce mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."
verses.hausa: Ya Ubangijinmu! Ka kuranye mana azãba. Lalle Mũ, mãsu ĩmãni ne.

verses.arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.
verses.hausa: Inã tunãwa take a gare su, alhãli kuwa, haƙĩƙa, Manzo mai bayyanãwa Ya je musu (da gargaɗin saukar azãbar, ba su karɓa ba)?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
verses.english: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan suka jũya baya daga gare shi, Kuma suka ce: "Wanda ake gayãwa ne, mahaukaci."

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, Mãsu kuranyẽwar azãba ne, a ɗan lõkaci kaɗan, lalle kũ, mãsu kõmãwa ne (ga laifin).

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
verses.english: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.
verses.hausa: Rãnar da Muke damƙa, damƙa mafi girma, lalle ne Mũ mãsu azãbar rãmuwa ne.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.english: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa a gabaninsu, Mun fitini mutãnen Fir'auna, kuma wani Manzo karĩmi ya jẽ musu.

verses.arabic: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.english: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger,"
verses.hausa: (Mazon ya ce): "Ku kãwo mini (ĩmãninku) ya bayin Allah! Lalle ni, Manzo ne amintacce zuwa gare ku."

verses.arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.
verses.hausa: "Kuma kada ku nẽmi ɗaukaka a kan Allah. Lalle nĩ mai zo muku ne da dalĩli bayyananne."

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
verses.english: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle nĩ na nẽmi tsari da Ubangijĩna, kuma Ubangijinku, dõmin kada ku jẽfe ni."

verses.arabic: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
verses.english: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."
verses.hausa: "Kuma idan ba ku yi ĩmãni sabõda nĩ ba, to, ku nĩsance ni."

verses.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.english: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.
verses.hausa: Sai ya kirayi Ubangjinsa cẽwa waɗannan mutãnene mãsu laifi.

verses.arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.english: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.
verses.hausa: (Allah Ya ce): "To, ka yi tafiyar dare da bayiNa, da dare. Lalle kũ, waɗanda ake bĩ ne (dõmin a kãma ku.)"

verses.arabic: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.english: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ka bar tẽku rarrabe. Lalle sũ, runduna ce abar nutsarwa."

verses.arabic: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.english: How much they left behind of gardens and springs
verses.hausa: Da yawa suka bar gõnaki da marẽmari.

verses.arabic: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.english: And crops and noble sites
verses.hausa: Da shuke-shuke da matsayi mai kyau.

verses.arabic: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ
verses.english: And comfort wherein they were amused.
verses.hausa: Da wata ni'ima da suka kasance a cikinta sunã mãsu hutu.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.english: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.
verses.hausa: Kamar haka! Kuma Muka gãdar da ita ga waɗansu mutãne na dabam.

verses.arabic: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
verses.english: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan samã da ƙasã ba su yi kũka a kansu ba, Kuma ba su kasance waɗanda ake yi wa jinkiri ba.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
verses.english: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa Mun tsĩrar da Banĩ Isrã'ĩla daga, azãba mai wulãkantãwa.

verses.arabic: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.english: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.
verses.hausa: Daga Fir'auna. Lalle shi, ya kasance maɗaukaki daga cikin mãsu ɓarna.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun zãɓe su sabõda wani ilmi (na Taurata) a kan mutãne.

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bã su, daga ãyõyin mu'ujizõji, abin da yake a cikinsa, akwai ni'ima bayyananna

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying,
verses.hausa: Lalle waɗannan mutãne, haƙĩka, sunã cẽwa,

verses.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
verses.english: "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.
verses.hausa: "Babu wani abu sai mutuwarmu ta farko, kuma ba mu zama waɗanda ake tãyarwa ba."

verses.arabic: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."
verses.hausa: "Sai ku zo da ubanninmu, idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya."

verses.arabic: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.
verses.hausa: shin, sũ ne mafĩfĩta kõ kuwa mutãnen Tubba'u, kuma da waɗanda ke a gabãninsu? Mun halaka su, lalle sũ, sun kasance mãsu laifi.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
verses.english: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu halitta slmmai da ƙasa da abin da ke a tsakãninsu ba, alhãli kuwa Munã mãsu wãsã.

verses.arabic: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.
verses.hausa: Ba Mu halitta su ba fãce da manufa ta gaskiya, kuma amma mafi yawansu, ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -
verses.hausa: Lalle rãnar rarrabẽwa, ita ce lõkacin wa'adinsu gabã ɗaya.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.english: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -
verses.hausa: Rãnar da wani zumu bã ya amfãnin wani zumu da kõme kuma ba su zama anã taimakon su ba.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.english: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: fãce wanda Allah Ya yi wa rahama. Lalle Shi (Allah), shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.english: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum
verses.hausa: Lalle itãciyar zaƙƙũm (ɗanyen wutã),

verses.arabic: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
verses.english: Is food for the sinful.
verses.hausa: Ita ce abincin mai laifi.

verses.arabic: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
verses.english: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies
verses.hausa: Kamar narkakken kwalta yanã tafasa a cikin cikunna.

verses.arabic: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.english: Like the boiling of scalding water.
verses.hausa: Kamar tafasar ruwan zãfi.

verses.arabic: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.english: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,
verses.hausa: (A cẽ wa malã'ikun wutã), "Ku kãmã shi, sa'an nan ku fizge shi zuwa ga tsakiyar Jahĩm."

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.english: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan ku zuba, a kansa, daga azãbar ruwan zãfi."

verses.arabic: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
verses.english: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble!
verses.hausa: (A ce masã), "Ka ɗanɗana! Lalle kai, kai ne mabuwãyi mai girma!"

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."
verses.hausa: "Lalle wannan, shi ne abin da kuka kasance kunã shakka game da shi."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place;
verses.hausa: Lalle mãsu taƙawa sunã cikin matsayi amintacce.

verses.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.english: Within gardens and springs,
verses.hausa: A cikin gidãjen Aljanna da marẽmari.

verses.arabic: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.english: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.
verses.hausa: Sunã tufanta daga tufãfin alharĩni raƙĩƙi, da mai kauri, sunã mãsu zaman fuskantar jũna.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.english: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
verses.hausa: Kamar haka, kuma Mun aurar da su da mãtã mãsu kyaun idãnu, mãsu girmansu.

verses.arabic: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.english: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.
verses.hausa: Sunã kira, a cikinsu (gidẽjen) ga dukan 'ya'yan itãcen marmari, sunã amintattu (daga dukan abin tsõro).

verses.arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.english: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire
verses.hausa: Bã su ɗanɗanar mutuwa, a cikinsu, fãce mutuwar farko, kuma (Allah), Ya tsare musu azãbar Jahĩm.

verses.arabic: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.english: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.
verses.hausa: Sabõda falala daga Ubangijinka. Wancan shi ne babban rabo, mai girma.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded.
verses.hausa: Dõmin haka kawai Muka sauƙaƙar da shi (Alƙur'ãni) da harshenka, tsammãninsu, su riƙa tunãwa.

verses.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
verses.english: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end].
verses.hausa: Sai ka yi jira. Lalle sũ, mãsu jira ne.
